titles.title: Corrosion Prevention Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the use of corrosion prevention and mitigation measures in the construction and maintenance of business property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/29/2007--Introduced. Corrosion Prevention Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business-related tax credit for 50% of net expenditures for engineering design, materials, and application and installation of corrosion prevention and mitigation technology for depreciable property comprised primarily of metals susceptible to corrosion. Terminates such credit after 2017.
